name: AlgU
Function: algU (rpoE),  hrpR, alginate biosynthesis, stress resistance: oxidative, osmotic, heat, UV, and metal ion stress

name: Alginate
Function: Alginate biosynthesis, phenol degradation protein, benzaldehyde dehydrogenase, dimethylglycine demethylation, genes involved in amino acid transport and metabolism

name: Carbon Starvation-1
Function: Carbon starvation response: carbon starvation protein A, acetate utilization; pilin assembly: tadABCZ (homologs), rcpAC (homologs), flp family type IVb pilin

name: Carbon Starvation-2
Function: Inositol phosphate and galactose metabolism

name: Chaperone
Function: Chaperones, heat shock proteins, proteins involved in repair processes other than in response to heat shock, ATP-dependent protease ATPase subunits

name: Chemotaxis
Function: crp, csrA, flgM, chemotaxis proteins, membrane components, fliC, methyl accepting chemotaxis proteins, glycosyltransferase, several genes involved in signal transduction, flagellar genes: hook-associated proteins, filament capping protein, motor protein, motor stator protein

name: Coronatine
Function: Coronatine biosynthesis: coronamic acid and coronafacic acid; alginate biosynthesis; type III effectors

name: Fatty Acid
Function: psrA, fadAB, etfAB, genes with multiple drug resistance domains

name: Fe-S/Oxidative Stress
Function: Fe-S cluster assembly, oxidative stress resistance: sodA, fumC, katB, catalase

name: Fe/Protein Transport
Function: Iron starvation response: PvdS,  FoxR (ortholog), other sigma factors associated with iron starvation response, bacterioferritin, bacterioferritin-associated ferredoxin, energy transduction (exbBD), TonB-dependent siderophore receptors

name: Flagella-1
Function: fleS/fleR two component system, flagellar biosynthesis and assembly: rod; hook; L; M, and P ring; hook and basal body complex; motor switch; flagellar type III secretion system

name: Flagella-2
Function: Glycosyltransferase, flagellar biosynthesis and assembly: hook, P-ring, export ATPase, chaperone, type III secretion system; cheZ

name: Folate
Function: Tetrahydrofolate production: soxGADB, folD, purU

name: IS-elements
Function: transposases, ptrB

name: Nitrogen
Function: Nitrogen stress response: ntrB/ntrC two component system, glnK, amtB, utilization of alternate nitrogen sources: urea (conversion of urea to ammonia), amino acids (transporters), pyrimidines (rutABCD), allantoin (allantoin permease), GABA (GABA permease)

name: Osmotic Stress
Function: Osmotic/water stress resistance: osmoprotectants, compatible solute production; oxidative stress resistance

name: Phage
Function: prtN, ptrB, prophage genes associated with pyocin production in Pseudomonas aeruginosa

name: Plasmid
Function: Plasmid genes: conjugal transfer proteins, DNA primase, glycoside hydrolase, mobilization proteins, type III effectors, integrase, UV resistance protein A, replication initiation protein; efflux transporters, glycine metabolism, sarcosine oxidase subunits ( likely due to plasmid manipulation)

name: Protocatechuate
Function: Benzoate degradation: pcaBCGHK

name: Pyoverdine
Function: Biosynthesis and transport of pyoverdine, metal transporters

name: Recombination
Function: Recombinases family proteins, several genes of unknown function

name: Resistance-1
Function: MarR transcriptional regulator, efflux transporter subunits (RND, MFS, etc.), sulforaphane/aliphatic isothiocyanate, resistance proteins (saxAF)

name: Resistance-2
Function: Syringafactin production and efflux, cueR, copper transport, chemotaxis, uric acid production, virulence factor srfB, virulence effector srfC, bacterioferritin, Flp type IV pilin

name: Sulfur-1
Function: Taurine, alkane sulfonate, cysteine, and methionine transport

name: Sulfur-2
Function: Sulfur starvation response protein (oscA), alkane sulfonate transporters, sulfate transporters, amino acid transporters

name: T3SS
Function: hrpR, hrpS, hrpL, coronatine biosynthesis activation: corP, corR/corS two component system, type III effectors, type III secretion system chaperones, type III secretion system components, type III secretion proteins, type III helper protein, type III restriction system endonuclease,ribosome modulation factor, HPr kinase, pectate lyase, flagellar hook length control protein

name: Translation-1
Function: Ribosomal proteins, atpCG, secY, rpoA

name: Translation-2
Function: Ribosome maturation factor, rho, rpsU, rpiU

name: Transport
Function: Transport of inorganic ions, amino acids, carbohydrates, and lipids; membrane proteins; carbon starvation protein A; tryptophan synthesis; syringafactin synthesis

name: Unchar-1
Function: colR/colS two component system, pyruvate metabolism, insecticidal toxins, groES, glycerol uptake, etc.

name: Unchar-2
Function: oxidative stress response: pqq, kdpf, organic hydroperoxide resistance protein, pirin (ortholog); nusA

name: Unchar-3
Function: phoP/phoQ two component system, phosphate ABC transporter, pyruvate dehydrogenase, pbpG

name: Unchar-4
Function: Zinc transporters, cadA, rpme-1, iron transporters and receptors

name: Unchar-5
Function: several unknown genes, type III effectors, cold shock domain-containing proteins, RNA-directed DNA polymerase, integrase, cysteine synthase familiy proteins

name: Unchar-6
Function: uncharacterized

name: Unchar-7
Function: lipid-A-disaccharide synthase, TolC family protein, dihydrolipoyllysine-residue acetyltransferase

name: Unchar-8
Function: fur, ribosomal proteins (rpsT, rplS, rpmE), ribosomal modulation factor, cold shock proteins, bacterioferritin, bacterioferritin-associated ferredoxin, transposases

name: Unchar-9
Function: molybdenum cofactor-associated genes: moaA, fdhD, oxidoreductase (molydopterin binding protein); xanyhine dehydrogenase subunits (xdhAB) and xanthine dehydrogenase accessory protein (xdhC)

name: Yersiniabactin
Function: Biosynthesis and transport of yersiniabactin

name: Zur
Function: Zinc transporters, cadA, rpme-1, iron transporters, and receptors

name: single_gene_1
Function: baeR, exdb, unknown genes

name: single_gene_2
Function: helix-turn-helix domain-containing protein, IS element, holin, kdpF, genes of unknown function

name: single_gene_3
Function: genes of unknown function

name: single_gene_4
Function: helix-turn-helix domain-containing protein, genes of unknown function

name: single_gene_5
Function: holin, genes of unknown function
